name: Agumon_(Bond_of_Bravery)
description: Agumon (Bond of Bravery) is an Unknown Digimon. A profound bond between Agumon and its Partner, it is a legendary, final digivolution, which realized after countless possibilities. The indomitable "Courage" of its Partner turned into hot flames that spurt out from its entire body, and appears as proof of their deep trust. By spending a long amount of time together, it has a deeper understanding of humans, and its digivolved form has also produced a shape close to that of a humanoid.
